Easy.Q: Which word means the same as happy? joyful, angry, sleepy, sad
Which word means the same as big? tiny, large, small, loud
Which word means the same as cold? warm, sunny, chilly, hot
Which word means the same as fast? slow, quiet, quick, sleepy
Which word means the same as smart? dull, slow, bright, heavy
Which word means the same as kind? cruel, mean, harsh, nice
Which word means the same as loud? silent, noisy, calm, soft
Which word means the same as funny? serious, happy, boring, amusing
Which word means the same as clean? messy, spotless, rough, dirty
Which word means the same as dark? bright, shadowy, light, sunny

Medium.Q: Which word means the same as begin? finish, pause, start, stop
Which word means the same as close? distant, shut, move, open
Which word means the same as glad? angry, bored, happy, annoyed
Which word means the same as bright? dull, shiny, dark, gloomy
Which word means the same as quick? heavy, lazy, fast, slow
Which word means the same as hard? shiny, tough, soft, smooth
Which word means the same as angry? happy, mad, calm, joyful
Which word means the same as dirty? clean, neat, tidy, messy
Which word means the same as brave? bold, cowardly, scared, strong
Which word means the same as tired? energetic, alert, sleepy, awake

Hard.Q: Which word means the same as enormous? small, huge, tiny, narrow
Which word means the same as silent? talkative, quiet, noisy, loud
Which word means the same as swift? clumsy, fast, slow, lazy
Which word means the same as fragile? strong, delicate, sturdy, heavy
Which word means the same as ancient? old, modern, new, recent
Which word means the same as stubborn? agreeable, soft, flexible, determined
Which word means the same as vanish? disappear, create, show, appear
Which word means the same as cautious? bold, clumsy, careless, careful
Which word means the same as joyful? mad, angry, sad, happy
Which word means the same as grateful? rude, upset, annoyed, thankful
